constituent: dwindle, water, water droplets, water pistol, march, mouth
heisigStory: A group of unquenchable mouths sets out on a march across the country, drinking water wherever they find it until the water supply has dwindled to a trickle, triggering a national disaster.
koohiiStory1: When WATER was tossed on the PROTESTORS (a march of mouths), the numbers began to DWINDLE.
koohiiStory2: When water supplies dwindled, the population became a horde of dry mouths, marching to seize the water in the neighboring kingdom.
myStory: cắt giảm. nước phải được cắt giảm vì tất cả.
readingExamples: 減らす (へ.らす), 減る (へ.る)
words: moderate, right, random, not thorough, vague, irresponsible, halfhearted
addition and subtraction, degree, extent, measure, chance
decrease (in size or number), diminish, abate
